extendedInfo.description: Drudge Report on Droid is the best and easiest to use Drudge Report reader on Google Play and the only one with a widget and tablet UI.Easily read articles and see images/watch videos from the Drudge Report (drudgereport.com) specifically formatted for your mobile device.Articles are parsed and formatted in a "Readability" like manner.Share the articles with friends by sms, email, twitter, facebook, etc. Use the share option from the options menu or from the Action bar. When sharing the link is prepopulated and you can add some personal text at the end.A widget is also included that can scroll through the latest links.Note: If you receive an error loading a link, you may be able to use the view original button in the Action bar to load the article. The formatter still has a few issues with certain web sites.The READ_PHONE_STATE permission is required by the ad network. The only data sent is the device id to be used as a unique identifier. The same data is sent to Google every time you turn your phone on.The External Storage permissions are used for image caching.A pro version is available that does not contain any ads and does not require this permission.This app is not affiliated with or authorized by the Drudge Report.Email suggestions to support@brennasoft.com

reviews.title: Yes um William?
reviews.comment: Do you really believe fox news is any less propaganda!? Lmao really? Hmmm another delusional goat.
reviews.author: Robert Clark

reviews.title: Great reporting
reviews.comment: The truth in reporting no left wing bullshit. This and fox news is the only fare and balanced news around. No lame stream media here..    If you don\'t agree  e-mail  wloughran600@gmail.com
reviews.author: William Loughran

reviews.comment: Total biased crap. Editor cherry-picks stories to back up his opinions
reviews.author: Scott McCollom

reviews.title: Not news
reviews.comment: Opinionated biased garbage just like Fox news. Just more mis information to make more right wing voters. Does anyone on the right care about the truth anymore? Thought I would give this a try to get a different view from BBC, cspan, CNN, etc but this is not news.
reviews.author: Rich webdevoman

reviews.title: Obnoxious animated ads
reviews.comment: Uninstalling because of obnoxious animated ads.
reviews.author: Rick Shafer

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Very informative
reviews.author: raja gupta

reviews.comment: I
reviews.author: Robert McLaughlin

reviews.title: Updates suck
reviews.comment: It worked for a bit after the update. Now it wont even load anything when i open the app. It wont even load half the news stories it says 404 error or 504 null its a good app when it works but i dont like it now
reviews.author: Joseph Holder

reviews.title: Needs Open Market
reviews.comment: Makes sharing easy, but bloats your links with self-promotion in free version. Can\'t buy the Pro version because they don\'t allow American\'s to use it if they are out of the country... no clue why. A five star app that can\'t be used get\'s one star. So, I\'m sticking with the Official Drudge Report app.
reviews.author: Jesse Steele

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Used to be great.  Now, no Drudge.  Just ads.
reviews.author: michael gravois

reviews.title: Not good lately
reviews.comment: This used to be my favorite drudge app, recently it won\'t open and stories within the app never open. Maybe it was  recent update
reviews.author: Steve G

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Since the last update it keeps crashing
reviews.author: Timothy Forton

reviews.title: This is great!
reviews.comment: Finally a Drudge app that is clean and smooth. This is the best DR app there is. And I\'ve tried all of them. Download it now!
reviews.author: Josh Chastain

reviews.title: Xoom Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: Update seems to have fixed issues. My favorite Drudge App.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great on tablet!
reviews.comment: It really looks nice on my tab.  Thanks for a great app that can take better advatage of the bigger screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good UI, bad app
reviews.comment: Works well, but started giving me 5-10 notifications a day.. I\'ll look at you if and when I want, don\'t give me \"urgent breaking news\" from a 3rd party aggregator. It\'s just annoying, uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: No real complaints!
reviews.author: Jason Nelson

reviews.title: Crashes on startup
reviews.comment: Never even loads on Nexus 7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the blackslash at the end of the bit.ly links!
reviews.comment: Developer, please revise the way your bit.ly links are generated.  They are adding an additional backslash on the end that creates broken links, at least in Twitter. If not fixed in a week, I\'m moving to a new app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like it so far
reviews.comment: I wish it would remember my choice on which column i want displayed. (Still don\'t know why anybody would choose something other than \"all.\")  Update: it now crashes every time i choose to view the original article.
reviews.author: A Google User
